title: No menu or windows appear after clicking on Firefox for Mac
content: I've tried uninstalling and re-installing the latest version for Mac. Firefox appears as open in the Dock but when double clicking to open, there is no menu bar or windows. When I right click on Firefox app, I click on "New Window" but still nothing appears.
creator: orlando_au

title: Account syncing no longer working without Firefox Mobile?
content: I'm unable to sign into Firefox and sync my bookmarks, history and extensions with Firefox. I just got a new PC and when I try to sign in I get a prompt asking me if I have Firefox mobile (i don't) so I say not now, and then I get a notice account disconnected. This never was a requirement in the past.
creator: RobM

title: down loader
content: i want to down load games on my computer
creator: liivviinng

title: Speech recognition is not working for all websites in Firefox
content: I have tried to use voice typing functionality from all major websites and found that speech recognition is not working at all in Firefox. The same voice typing works perfectly fine in Google Chrome web browser. If there is any solution then let me know. Not interested to use Google Chrome as it is consuming insane amount of my old PC RAM. It would be great if I could get help from Firefox. Because, Firefox is the only browser which is working smooth in my PC. I am using latest version of Firefox and I do not have any extension installed. In the incognito mode also facing same issue. Using Windows 10 and desktop version of Firefox.
creator: harsh.choksi1

title: Backup
content: Backup. Is there a simple way to backup my profile with history and bookmarks and passwords? Your instruction on Firefox are very confusing and not user friendly.
creator: kensosalla
